name: Chibi Pop Battle
description:
Player 1 : Girl

  • W - Up Direction
  • A - Left Direction
  • S - Down Direction
  • D - Right Direction
  • C - Throw Hammer
  • V - Create Obstacle

Player 2 : Boy

  • Up Arrow - Up Direction
  • Left Arrow - Left Direction
  • Down Arrow - Down Direction
  • Right Arrow - Right Direction
  • .    -     Throw Hammer
  • /    -     Create Obstacle
